typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.TimePeriods.PreHistory.Jobs: Shapes stone into things such as slinger ammo.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.TimePeriods.PreHistory.Item: A bag made of leaves and sticks for slow porters to carry items in.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.TimePeriods.PreHistory.Jobs: A basic porter to move resources from the crate to stockpile. Hire him to empty crates!
A basic porter to move resources from the stockpile to crate. Hire him to move items required for other jobs to crates near them!
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.Storage.BasicCrate: Can store a very small amount of items for jobs to get and store items from when not near the stockpile. Porters fill and empty these.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.Storage.Crate: Can store a small amount of items for jobs to get and store items from when not near the stockpile. Porters fill and empty these.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.Storage.PaddedCrate: Can store a moderate amount of items for jobs to get and store items from when not near the stockpile. Porters fill and empty these.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.Storage.StockpileBlock: Stockpile Block is where porters and colonists get items from your central stockpile. Colonists must be able to walk up to it. One per colony.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.Storage.Shelving: Place within your stockpiles block radius to upgrade your stockpiles capacity.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.Storage.Pallet: Place within your stockpiles block radius to upgrade your stockpiles capacity.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.Storage.CarvedLog: Place within your stockpiles block radius to upgrade your stockpiles capacity.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.Storage.Basket: Place within your stockpiles block radius to upgrade your stockpiles capacity.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.Storage.StorageDrawers: Place within your stockpiles block radius to upgrade your stockpiles capacity.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.Storage.IronChest: Can store a decent amount of items for jobs to get and store items from when not near the stockpile. Porters fill and empty these.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.TimePeriods.PreHistory.Jobs: A crafter that makes basic things out of wood.
typeuses.Pandaros.Civ.TimePeriods.PreHistory.Item: A log that hs been split up, useful to make basic things.
Carved from the finest rocks available.
